price: 4. Kad Jis gali atlyginti tiems, kurie tiki (Allaho Vienumą – islamiškąjį monoteizmą) ir daro teisingus gerus darbus. Jiems yra atleidimas ir rizk karim (dosnus aprūpinimas, t. y. Rojus).
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
